title: - CHG: Changed from icons to buttons on data source view.
message:
- CHG: Changed from icons to buttons on data source view.
- NEW: Added an "refresh" button to data source view.
- DEL: Removed old Toast notification.
- CHG: Updated data source view layout to work better on all screen sizes.
- NEW: Added landscape layout for EULA view.

title: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'

message: - CHG: Updated EULA text.

title: Updated README.md
message:
Updated README.md

- CHG: Removed the note about alpha phase.

message: - CHG: Updated build version and changelog.

- CHG: Restricted about page header height in landscape mode.

title: - CHG: Changed the height of the image section on the node details view to be more prominent.
message:
- CHG: Changed the height of the image section on the node details view to be more prominent.
- BUG: Fixed sizing of related items on the node details view.

title: - NEW: Added data source update check to notify when an update is available.
message:
- NEW: Added data source update check to notify when an update is available.
- CHG: Updated acknowledgements and team views.
- BUG: Fixed an issue with the main grid on older Android versions (pre-Lollipop).

title: - NEW: Added "similar diseases" section to disease details page.
message:
- NEW: Added "similar diseases" section to disease details page.
- NEW: Added main grid layout options to preferences screen.
- BUG: Fixed grid padding/margin issues.

title: - CHG: Simplified attribute view by removing expand/collapse buttons.
message:
- CHG: Simplified attribute view by removing expand/collapse buttons.
- CHG: Made color palette detection code more robust, so that it finds a color for the image in almost all cases.
- BUG: Fixed annoying orientation change bug where the node images weren't sized correctly.

title: - BUG: Fixed a bug with concurrent data source downloads by only allowing one…
message:
- BUG: Fixed a bug with concurrent data source downloads by only allowing one download at a time for now.
- BUG: Fixed an issue where a downloaded data source that is no longer available on the server wasn't selectable anymore.
- BUG: Fixed the floating action button (FAB) not reappearing after scrolling on the node view.

title: - CHG: Search now closes with a single click on the "x" symbol.
message:
- CHG: Search now closes with a single click on the "x" symbol.
- BUG: Fixed wrong preference activity title.
- CHG: Fixed fling behaviour for node details activity. Still no fix for about activity.
- CHG: Added people involved to acknowledgements section.

title: - NEW: Added shadow to title bar text so that it can be read even if the image…
message: - NEW: Added shadow to title bar text so that it can be read even if the image in the background is white.

title: - CHG: Made the data source selection page work offline so that you can switch…
message:
- CHG: Made the data source selection page work offline so that you can switch between data sources that are already downloaded even without a network connection.
- BUG: Fixed an issue with shared transitions between the node details activity and the fullscreen image activity.
- NEW: The data source icon of already downloaded data sources now works offline as well.
- NEW: Highlighted the email link in the data source view. Also made it clickable so that the default email app can be used to send an email.

title: - CHG: Added handling of external links in the form "http://bunta.ta/?d=X&n=Y"…
message:
- CHG: Added handling of external links in the form "http://bunta.ta/?d=X&n=Y" to jump straight to a node details page.
- CHG: Added full-screen image pager view. Just click on the image on the node details page.

title: - CHG: Updated copyright information.
message:
- CHG: Updated copyright information.
- CHG: Updated contact email address.

title: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'

title: - NEW: Added settings activity.
message:
- NEW: Added settings activity.
- NEW: Added option to disable Google Analytics tracking.
- NEW: Added option to cancel the data source download.

title: - CHG: Changed the way representative images for a node are chosen. If the…
message:
- CHG: Changed the way representative images for a node are chosen. If the representative image of the parent is one of the child's images as well, then use that one as the representative. This will make the flow through the app more intuitive to the user.
- CHG: If a node only has one child, directly jump to the child's details activity.
- CHG: Extended datasource view to show more details about the source when the user clicks on it.
- BUG: Fixed non-functioning share button on about page.
- CHG: Changed logo of the app.

title: - NEW: Added floating action button to main view to jump back to the start.
message:
- NEW: Added floating action button to main view to jump back to the start.
- CHG: Changed the way data source icons are handled.
- CHG: Changed the way data soruce icons are displayed.

title: - CHG: Completed name transition.
message: - CHG: Completed name transition.

title: - CHG: Replaced Restlet with RetroFit.
message:
- CHG: Replaced Restlet with RetroFit.
- DEL: Removed test related classes.
- NEW: Added ButterKnife.
- NEW: Added list transitions to data source list.
- BUG: Fixed grid item decoration padding.
- BUG: Fixed sizing issue of grid elements when there are more than 2 columns.
- CHG: Renamed the app from Knödel to Buntàta.

title: - NEW: Added acknowledgements section to about activity.
message:
- NEW: Added acknowledgements section to about activity.
- NEW: Added EULA fragment to introduction activity.
- NEW: Added video capabilities to the app.
- NEW: Added video view to NodeDetailsActivity and VideoActivity.
- CHG: Changed the style of the DatasourceFragment.
- BUG: Fixed layout issues on main grid view.
- DEL: Removed no longer required libraries.
- NEW: Added item transitions to main view filter.

title: - NEW: Added toolbar back button to DatasourceActivity.
message:
- NEW: Added toolbar back button to DatasourceActivity.
- NEW: Added network check slide to introduction.
- NEW: Added search functionality to main view. Users can now search for node names and attribute values.
- NEW: The DatasourceAdapter will now show two "groups" of data sources in the RecyclerView: local data sources and remote data sources. The first group contains the items available on the device whereas the second group represents items that are available for download.
- BUG: Fixed layout issues with grid RecyclerView.

title: - CHG: Added license information to all classes and the app itself.
message:
- CHG: Added license information to all classes and the app itself.
- NEW: Added About activity.
- NEW: Added a bunch of comments.
